attributes.action: To start a petition to open a vote on dissolving the Scottish Parliament.
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to start the proceedure to allow a vote to end the Scottish Parliament. This would mean a vote in British Parliament for England, Ireland and Wales to have a vote on Scotland and dissolving their Parliament. Scotland should not be allowed or their MPs in either vote.

We need a vote in Parliament to allow the English, Welsh and Irish people a vote with a yes/no to dissolving the Scottish Parliament.
attributes.background: Scotland Parliament has caused so many problems for the British public and wasted tax payers money on trying to stop the voters right to leave the eu and also trying to reverse the leave Britain vote that they lost. Scotland is now a burden to the British people.

rejection.details: We think that this petition is similar to yours: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/190859
